text: "Right Thurr" is the first single off of American rapper Chingy's debut studio album Jackpot. The remix was the fourth single from the album. The song was released on April 14, 2003. The song was able to make it to #2 on the Billboard Hot 100. A music video for the song was released. It was directed by Jessy Terrero. It features Chingy rapping on the porch of a run down house and flirting with girls that pass by. In the next part, they are partying in a casino-themed nightclub. It ends with Chingy rapping inside and in front of a diner. In 2004, an official remix was released. It featured rappers Jermaine Dupri and Trina. The remix won the "Remix of the Year" at the 2004 Source Awards. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Right Thurr" on YouTube Category:2003 songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: Right Thurr
